title: Can Someone Explain Me The Lands?
body:
Hi all!

I want to know what the Lands are in this Game.  I never really knew what they were for the last 11 years or so LOL.

I understand there will be those that feel maybe I should view the "Regions" Section (which is actually a sub-section of a Province in Geography), but Stories are meant to be Told right? :D.

So, can anyone fill me in?  I know there's some crazy Hextech City where Singed and Warwick are from or something; and there's the more Norse type of Icelands!

replies.body:
I could list every region with a quick description, but I honestly think it's more interesting to discover for yourself.
There's a really well made map, showing all known parts of Runeterra with descriptions, artwork, links to relevant info, and the like. I highly recommend checking it out.
https://map.leagueoflegends.com/

Not to speak for him, or anything, though.

Well, DerMangoJoghurt and Ebonmaw Dragon have already done a lovely job of giving you a good way to get started in on the **World of Runeterra**, but I'll  try helping out too :)

Far, far to the north, are the cold and terrible lands of the **Freljord**.  Here, clans, and clans of clans, battle for survival against each other, and the harshness of the land.  Ashe leads one such clan - the Avarosans - and you can read a comic about how she got her start here: 
https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/comic/ashewarmother/issue-1/0/
That should be a good start on the Freljord, but other champs from here include Braum, Lissandra, Sejuani (also in the comic!) and Ornn.  There are more.

Slightly to the south, where the weather gets milder and below an enormous mountain range, is **Demacia**.  A temperate land that was once traumatized by ancient magic such that many Demacians fear and hate all magic!  This is why Sylas rebelled against Jarvan IV's father, the king, and escaped the capital with a group of oppressed mages.  Demacia is otherwise very pastoral, and usually peaceful, and some of the champs from there include Quinn, Shyvanna, Garen and his sister Lux, and Sona.
Here's another comic showing Demacia: https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/comic/lux/issue-1/0/

Across the land to the east, with various smaller independand states in between, lies the main body of the Empire of **Noxus**.  A huge empire that touches all three known continents, Noxus values strength above all, and takes over territory like it was going out of fashion.  They basically don't care who you are, or what you do, as long as you do it with strength, and you do it for the empire.  Some champs from here include Swain, Talon, Kled, Sion, and Riven.
It's only a one shot, but it's one of my faves - a comic about Darius in Noxus: https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/comic/darius/bloodofnoxus/0/

And those three are the main, known, regions of the northern continent - known as Valoran.

To the south, is the continent of Shurima, dominated by the desert region (previously an empire) of **Shurima**.  This mostly desert land was once mighty, with a great river that brought life and water - controlled by the emperors of ancient time and their magic from the enormous Sun Disc magic devices.  They and their Ascended warriors (including Nasus and Renekton) conquered pretty much the whole continent before Xerath's betrayal of the Emperor Azir caused the empire to fall.  Their people have been struggling to survive ever since.  Some champs include Sivir, Rammus, Taliyah, and Kassadin.

On the western coast of the Shuriman continent, around an unnaturally tall mountain range, is **Targon**.  The land is harsh, steep, and deadly - and the people twice as much so.  They mostly follow the religion of the sun, led by the Solari (such as Leona) and the very special, rare, chosen few who manage to climb the very highest mountain and reach the special place above, become Aspects - such as Diana, Zoe, Taric, and Pantheon (although, that's complicated now).

On the opposite, eastern, coast of the Shuriman continent are the jungles and arcologies of **Ixtal**.  Hidden from the outside world by geography and magic, mostly they have practiced their abilities and kept away from the (seemingly primitive) outside world for centuries - though Qiana is keen to change that.  We've not learned a lot about this area yet, but the surrounding jungles are deadly and full of champs like Nidalee and Zyra.

Across the ocean to the east is the **Shadow Isles**.  Once beautiful, refined, and educated lands that hid from the rest of the world behind their magical white mist, a terrible catastrophe and betrayal caused them to fall into ruin and become cursed.  Now, the black mist causes harrowings, and entities such as Thresh, Hecarim, and Kalista haunt and stalk the lands (while entities like Maokai and Yorick try to make things better).

Speaking of the Harrowing (that intermittant arrival of the Black Mist swooping over the ocean and killing all in its path) to the north of the Shadow Isles are the Serpent Isles with the city of **Bilgewater**.  A mishmash of criminals and bounty hunters and monster killers, this tropical, highly vertical, island city builds tall to try to keep away from the ghostly attacks (and the smell of butchered sea monsters).  Gangplank once ruled here, but was deposed (violently) by Miss Fortune.  Other dangerous sorts that are associated with this place are Fizz, Nautilus, Illaoi, Twisted Fate, and Graves.

If you continue across the ocean even further north, you find our third continent: Ionia.

**Ionia** is a diverse land of many peoples and many climates - from the dry desert-like southern lands to the frozen north.  It's a land of many land masses and islands, of magical forests and of war-scarred coastlines (as the Noxians what happened).  The land here has a will of its own sometimes, and the path that should take you home might take you deeper into enchanted marshlands or into trouble with spurned, beautiful, spirits.  This is where you'd find Yasuo, Syndra (who has 'borrowed' an island of her own), Shen, Wukong, and Ahri.

Last but not least, on the tiny land bridge between Valoran (the northern continent) and Shurima (the southern continent) are two cities stacked one on top of the other.  On the surface, is **Piltover** the city of progress where the streets are wide and full of technology.  Where massive amounts of trade ships pass through their gates in order to cross the land bridge (and thus Piltover makes bank from their taxes).  It's a city of new vehicles, of incredible works of public art funded by trade clans, and of gleaming glass rooftops.  This is where you'd find champs like Caitlyn, Jayce, Orianna, and Camille.

Below Piltover, in the chasms that formed after the creation of the gates that create all those taxes, is **Zaun**.  Grungy, grimy, and polluted by the chemical poison known as The Grey, the people in Zaun live in the narrow streets and alleyways of the chasm.  It's full of industry - of hard working people trying to make a better life - of secretive inventors hiding from prying eyes.  It's got enormous glass domes where the rich keep their air-making gardens, and it's got pools and pits of toxic chemicals.  This, then, is where you'd find Singed, Warwick, Ekko, Viktor, and Jinx.

(There's also the **Void**, which isn't really a 'place' you go to - but it's where you'd find the origin point of Kha'Zix, Vel'Koz, and Kog'Maw, and where Kai'sa and Malzahar are known to hang around.  And there's Bandle City, the land of the yordles (like Teemo, Tristana, and Lulu) which isn't a place on the map but you can reach there through portals.)
I think Icathia is worth mentioning, simply for its relation to Shurima and the Void.

If you are too lazy to check the map https://map.leagueoflegends.com/

I will tell you the name and a really basic description of some Regions:

Zaun is the "Crazy Hextech City where Singed and Warwick are from or something"... Actually is more of a Chemtech City underground Piltover.

Piltover in other hand is the Crazy Hextech City where Caitlyn and Jayce are.

Freljord is the place of all the Ice champs. Brand and Ornn are from there as well. Imagine Vikings and Barbarians with ice powers.

Demacia is one that everyone knows thanks to the champs that yell "DEMACIA" all the time. Its a medieval looking place full of anti magic stone, because they hate mages, even if some demacian are mages.

Noxus is the dark edgy place were most of the evil looking humans come from. Dont let the appearences fool you, not all of them are evil. But they are in constant war with everyone, specially Ionia.

Freljord Demacia and Noxus are in the continent of Valoran (Edit: Zaun and Piltover are bewteen Shurima and Valoran... But its more of a Shuriman place)

Ionia is the place of most of the japanese/anime looking champs. They have Ninjas, Samurais, things like that. Its a big island continent.

Shurima is a continent, but is also the name of the faction of all the Egyptian god like champs and sand people (except Malphite) Darkins are from there as well.

Icathia was a place from shurima invaded by the Void. You must know the Void... all those purple monster champs. The Void is a different Dimension of Aliens.

Targon is the place of most of the champs related to the cosmos, sun, moon, stars. Its the tallest mountain of the World.

Ixtal is the jungle faction, Qiyana is from there. Its a jungle in the desert of Shurima. It has some latin american inspirations.

Targon, Icathia, Ixtal and Shurima are part of the continent of Shurima.

The Shadow Isles is the place of most of the undead people, its a spooky place.

Bilgewater in the place of the pirate looking guys.

Runeterra is the name of the World.

Bandle City is not part of the world. Its a spiritual place where most of the yordles live... yordles are the small champs from the game, like teemo (Nunu and Annie are not Yordles... Nunu is from Freljord and Annie is from... Noxus technically).

No problem, just keep in mind that not all the champs belong to a specific place of the world, some travel between places (Like Ezreal who is from Piltover, but travels arround the world (his glove is from Shurima)) and some were born in one place, but they are currently fighting for another faction (Like Kayn, who was a Noxian who joined to Ionia and wields a Darkin, darkins are from Shurima)

And most a lot of yordles live in a faction that is not Bandle City (Poppy is Demacian, Kled Noxian, Gnar from Freljord, Ziggs from Zaun, Heimerdinger from Piltover, Fizz from Bilgewater and Kennen from Ionia)

Icathia and the Void are 2 different things. Icathia was a place... but a massive portal to the Void was oppened there and most of the Icathians died. Jax and Zilean and from Icathia. Malzahar was a Shuriman "psychic" that became obsesed with the Void, Kassadin was a Shuriman merchant who lost his family thanks to the Void and now wants to destroy the Void using powers from the Void, Kaisa is the daughter of Kassadin who survived the void attack and uses the power of the Void to fight the Void. Chogath, Khazix, Kogmaw, Baron Nashor and Reksai are all creatures from the Void (Reksai lives in Shurima and Khazix in Ixtal))

You could think that Syndra is from the Void or Icathia, but she is from Ionia.

> I think Ionia, based on "Marsh Lands" if could EVEN be mixed in there; is not that Meadowey land you'd see a big Hunky Garen waiting.  It's more of a Water based Land!

Ionia has a "magical touch" that  forgot to mention, most of the people that live there live in balance with the nature. Their buildings are basically trees that grow in the shape of homes thanks to magic.

> There seems to be some Fire Land that some come from; thought to be a really dry & black desolate type of place.  And there is some type of Sky World with Cloud Spires and such.

Those lands do not exist in Runeterra as far as i know, but if i remember correctly, Ornn from Freljord lives in a Volcano.
